name: id
description: The unique Spotify ID for the album.

name: album_type
description: The type of the album: one of album, single, or compilation.

name: album_group
description: The field is present when getting an artistâ€™s albums. Possible values are album, single, compilation, appears_on.

name: total_tracks
description: The number of tracks in the album.

name: release_date
description: The date the album was first released. Stored as STRING because precision can vary (e.g., '1981-12' or '1981').

name: release_date_precision
description: The precision with which release_date value is known: year, month, or day.

name: uri
description: The Spotify URI for the album.

name: href
description: A link to the Web API endpoint providing full details of the album.

name: available_markets
description: A list of the country codes in which the album is available.

name: external_urls
description: Known external URLs for this album.

name: images
description: The cover art for the album in various sizes.

name: artists
description: The artists associated with the album.
